description: Jin Kunugi is the stern and quiet commander of TERRA`s military operations. He prefers delegating tasks to his subordinates and "managing by exception." Kunugi was an officer of the Japan Self-Defense Forces, under the command of Kuki Masayoshi, who ordered him to perform a hydrogen bomb on the Mu. His daughter Michiru was killed in the following war, and Kunugi became estranged from his wife.
name: Kunugi Jin
